description: Bradford City defender Paul Huntington extends his deal at the club until the end of the season.
title: Paul Huntington; Bradford City defender extends his deal at the club
title_page: Paul Huntington; Bradford City defender extends his deal at the club - BBC Sport
maintext:
Veteran Bradford City defender Paul Huntington has extended his stay with the club until the end of the season.
The 37-year-old centre half joined the Bantams in September on a short-term deal and has impressed in his eight appearances for the League Two side.
Manager Graham Alexander said: "It was an easy decision to extend Paul's deal as he's made such a good impression with everyone here.
"He has shown his desire to be successful again, plus his quality and experience will undoubtedly be an important asset to us this season."
Huntington has two promotions under his belt with Preston North End from League One in 2014-15 and more recently with Carlisle United from League Two in 2022-23.
